title: Migos
SEODescription: Migos - The best way to manage your Secret Santa
migosIsReadyToHelp: Migos is ready to help your group of friends to do your Secret Santa!
letUsWithTheBoringPart: Let us with the boring part, and make your xmas better
weWereCreatedToAddPracticalityToYourXmas: We were created to add practicality to your xmas with:
preRegisterCTA: I heard that Migos will be free at launch and those who pre-register will get a 30% lifetime discount when it starts charging, is that true?
mobilePreRegisterCTA: I heard that Migos will be free at launch and those who pre-register will get a 30% lifetime discount when it starts charging, plus several exclusive benefits for early users, is that true?
weAreExcitedToHaveYouJoinUs: We're excited to have you join us at
weveReceivedYourPreRegistrationRequest: We've received your pre-registration request. We'll notify you as soon as we're ready to welcome you aboard!
inTheMeantimeKeepAnEyeOnYourInboxAt: In the meantime, keep an eye on your inbox at
weWillBeSendingYouImportantUpdatesAboutY: We'll be sending you important updates about your account status
thisIsAnAutomatedEmailPleaseDoNotReply: This is an automated email. Please do not reply.

passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
name: Name
budgetMustHaveAtMost2Decimals: Budget must have at most 2 decimal places
groupNameMin: Group name must be at least 3 characters
drawDateMustBeInFuture: Draw date must be in the future
endDateMustBeInFuture: End date must be in the future
endDateMustBeAfterDrawDate: End date must be after draw date
effortlesslyOrganizeYourSecretSanta: Effortlessly organize your Secret Santa with our powerful features, crafted for seamless and enjoyable gift exchanges.
groupManagementBenefits: Effortlessly create and manage multiple Secret Santa groups with customizable budgets and deadlines tailored to your needs.
effortlessInvitationsBenefits: Invite your friends with just a few simple clicks, making the process quick and enjoyable.
smartGiftMatchingBenefits: Effortlessly connect your friends with their ideal Secret Santa gifts, ensuring everyone is delighted.
personalizedGiftTipsBenefits: Receive tailored gift suggestions for your Secret Santa group, making every present even more special.
findOutWhoToGift: Find out who you'll be gifting to in this group
weAreWorkingOnItRightNow: We are working on it right now
